Description: Ostracon, fragment (two pieces now joined) of the shoulder-section of a red-grey pottery jar, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey in section, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393496) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393496)
